info.description: API documentation for Thums Up Backend Service including Contest Week Management
info.title: Thums Up Backend API

post.description: Admin endpoint to select winners for a specific contest week. Requires API key authentication.

get.description: Get the login count for the authenticated user

post.description: Get a new access token using a valid refresh token
Send a one-time password to the provided phone number for authentication. Returns the OTP in the response (for development/testing purposes when SMS service is not configured).
Register a new user with phone number, name, and optional email and referral code
Verify the OTP sent to the phone number and return authentication token

get.description: Retrieve all avatars, optionally filtered by publication status

post.description: Create a new avatar with name and image file. Requires authentication.

parameters.description: Avatar image file (jpg, jpeg, png, gif, webp, svg, bmp, ico)
parameters.name: image

get.description: Retrieve a specific avatar by its ID
Retrieve a list of all contest weeks

post.description: Create a new contest week with week number, start date, end date, and winner count. Requires authentication.
Activate a specific contest week by week number. Only one week can be active at a time. Requires authentication.

get.description: Retrieve the currently active contest week
Retrieve a specific contest week by its week number
get.summary: Get contest week by week number

get.description: Retrieve the authenticated user's profile information including avatar image, winner status, and QR code URL (if user has won and submitted KYC). The is_winner flag indicates if the user is a winner. The QR code is generated after the user submits their KYC details. Requires authentication. This endpoint is optimized with concurrent data fetching using goroutines.

patch.description: Update the authenticated user's profile information (name, email, avatar, sharing_platform, platform_user_name). Requires authentication.

400.description: Validation failed or email already in use

get.description: Retrieve all addresses for the authenticated user. Requires authentication.

post.description: Add a new delivery address for the authenticated user. Validates pincode and location deliverability. Requires authentication.

400.description: Validation failed or location not deliverable

put.description: Update an existing address for the authenticated user. Validates pincode and location deliverability. Requires authentication.

400.description: Validation failed or location not deliverable

403.description: Address does not belong to user

delete.description: Delete an existing address for the authenticated user. Requires authentication.

403.description: Address does not belong to user

get.description: Get all active questions with user's answers

post.description: Create or update questions and options
Get a question by its text and language ID
Submit a new question with text and language. Requires authentication.

get.description: Retrieve all active states. Returns a list of all states where is_active is true and is_deleted is false, ordered by name alphabetically.

post.description: Submit an answer to a Thunder Seat question for the current week with optional media file (image/audio/video). Requires authentication.

parameters.description: Sharing platform (instagram, snapchat, facebook, twitter, tiktok, youtube)
parameters.name: social_media

parameters.description: Optional media file (image max 10MB, video max 10MB, audio max 100MB)
parameters.name: media_file

get.description: Retrieve the current active contest week details including dates and winner count

500.description: Failed to get active contest week

get.description: Retrieve all Thunder Seat answer submissions for the authenticated user. Requires authentication.
Get the current website status (live, live_soon, or coming_soon) based on launch date
Retrieve all winners with pagination support

post.description: After being selected as a winner, user submits their KYC details including name, email, optional Aadhar card images, and up to three cities for additional information. Aadhar card number and images are optional. Cities are optional text fields.
Mark the congratulations banner as viewed for the authenticated user

500.description: Failed to mark banner as viewed

get.description: Check if the authenticated user has won, whether they have viewed the congratulations banner, and if they have participated in the contest. Returns has_won (true if user is a winner), has_viewed (true if banner was viewed), has_participated (true if user has submitted any answers in thunder_seat), week_number (if won), and qr_code_url (if won).
Retrieve all winners for a specific contest week

APIKey.description: Admin API key for protected operations
APIKey.name: X-API-Key

Bearer.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token
Bearer.name: Authorization
